content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
- Steam engine at position(-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 16.0) with coal fuel
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected via pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric network with multiple poles covering coordinates from (-6.5,8.5) to (2.5,8.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex 1
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at position(-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at position(-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex 2
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -53.0)
- Input chest at position(-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at position(-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining System
- Burner mining drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at position(41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at position(41.5, -79.5)

### Science Pack Production Line
- Input chest at position(5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at position(6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at position(8.5, 13.5) producing automation science packs
- Output inserter at position(10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at position(11.5, 13.5)
- Connected via belt groups for material transport
- Lab for research consumption

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors with extracting items from chests
- Verify that the target chest actually contains the items before attempting extraction
- The automation science pack extraction attempts are failing because the output chest is empty

### Resource shortage errors
- Ensure assembling machines have all required ingredients before production
- Current automation science pack production is stalled due to missing copper plates and iron gear wheels

### Fuel management errors
- Monitor coal levels in inventory before attempting to fuel machines
- Keep a minimum stock of coal in inventory for refueling operations

### Production line efficiency
- Monitor and maintain continuous supply of raw materials to avoid production stoppages
- Ensure proper connection and functioning of all inserters in the production chain

### Power system maintenance
- Keep boiler fueled to maintain consistent power generation
- Monitor steam and water levels in the pipe systems
